fields.title: About
fields.content:
I made this website because I wanted a central repository of information tracking progress (or lack thereof) of various development projects in Nepal.

I believe that political atmosphere of our country will keep on gaining stability in the coming days. In this light, we, along with our government, also need to maintain a level of diligence towards the development efforts happening in our country.

My plan is to make this platform more collaborative in the future. I hope you find it useful.

The source code is publicly available at this [GitHub repo](https://github.com/poudel/gm).
